name: Overhead Triceps Extension
cues: Hold a dumbbell or ruck plate overhead with both hands, elbows facing forward
Lower the weight behind your head, keeping elbows close to your ears
Extend your arms fully to raise the weight back overhead, without overextending
Brace your core to protect your low back
Use a light-to-moderate weight you can control
Keep your upper arms stable throughout the movement
Perform the movement slowly and with control
variations: Use a resistance band or cable
